devdoc.author: Cooper Labs
devdoc.details: This contract is an authorized fork of Angle's `SettersGuardian` contract https://github.com/AngleProtocol/angle-transmuter/blob/main/contracts/monetizer/facets/SettersGuardian.sol
devdoc.title: SettersGuardian

setFees(address,uint64[],int64[],bool).notice: Sets the mint or burn fees for `collateral`

setRedemptionCurveParams(uint64[],int64[.notice: Sets the parameters for the redemption curve

setStablecoinCap(address,uint256).notice: Sets the stablecoin cap that can be issued from a `collateral`

togglePause(address,uint8).notice: Changes the pause status for mint or burn transactions for `collateral`

toggleWhitelist(uint8,address).notice: Changes the whitelist status for a collateral with `whitelistType` for an address `who`
